source: After landing on a mysterious island close to Atlantis, the remaining Atlanteans struggle to make a new home for themselves.
target: Nakon pristajanja na mistični otok u blizini Atlantide, ostatak Atlantiđana se muči stvoriniti novi dom.

source: Cornmeal is produced in a mill out of corn and is one of three parts of the Atlantean bread produced in bakeries.
target: Kukuruzno brašno se proizvodi od kukuruza u mlinovima i jedan je od tri vrste kruha koji se proizvode u pekarama širom Atlantide.

source: After landing on a mysterious island close to Atlantis, the remaining Atlanteans struggle to make a new home for themselves.
target: Nakon pristajanja na mistični otok u blizini Atlantide, ostatak Atlantiđana se muči stvoriniti novi dom.

source: Return to the multiplayer game setup
Produces armor for the soldiers.
Produces armor for the soldiers.
Blackroot Flour is produced in mills out of blackroots. It is used in bakeries to make a tasty bread.
target: Crnokorijensko brašno se proizvodi u mlinovima za crni korijen. Koristi se za pečenje ukusnog kruha.

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: Crnokorijensko brašno se proizvodi u mlinovima za crni korijen. Koristi se za pečenje ukusnog kruha.

source: Let’s hope that Lanissa – the warlord holding sway over that castle – has not discovered our movements yet. Perhaps we have a chance of conquering that mighty building without a bigger fight! However, it is essential that we capture it. It will be the key to our reign over this island!
target: Nadajmo se da nas Lanissa – vojskovođa koja kontrolira dvorac – još nije otkrila. Možda imamo šansu osvojiti tu močnu utvrdu bez puno žrtava! Prevažno je da ju osvojimo. Ona je ključna u našoj budućoj vladavini nad otokom!

source: Great! Erwyn gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less strong warlord on this island!
target: Bravo! Erwyn se je predao kad je vidio da njegovo posljednje uporište gori. Jedan veliki vojskovođa na otoku manje!

source: Great! Jomo gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less warlord on this island!
target: Bravo! Jomo se je predao kad je vidio da njegovo posljednje uporište gori. Jedan veliki vojskovođa na otoku manje!

source: In this scenario, the higher production buildings including mining will be introduced.
target: U ovom scenariju upoznajemo napredne proizvodne građevine i rudarenje.

source: This tutorial explains the handling of military and training site buildings and will introduce fighting.
target: Ovaj vodič objašnjava rukovanje vojnicima i treniranje vojske. Također, uvodi i borbu.

source: In this tutorial, you will learn how to navigate in Widelands and how to build buildings and roads.
target: Ovaj vodič će Vam pokazati osnove Widelandsa i kako da sagradite građevine i ceste.

source: Enable the showing of building spaces
Be sure to send a geologist to survey sites before building a well or a mine.
target: Pošaljite geologa da istraži mjesto prije nego što napravite bunar ili rudnik.

source: Military buildings lost
Military buildings defeated
%s has won the game. Congratulations!
/endForcedPause        -  Return game to normal speed.
Multiplayer Game Setup

Widelands tried to start a game with a file that could not be found at the given path.
The file was: %s
If this happens in a network game, the host might have selected a file that you do not own. Normally, such a file should be sent from the host to you, but perhaps the transfer was not yet finished!?!
target:
Widelands je pokušao pokrenuti igru iz datoteke koja ne postoji na zadanoj putanji.
Ime datoteke je: %s
Ako je ova poruka u mrežnoj igri, domačin je vjerojatno odabrao datoteku koju nemate. Uobičajeno je da se sve potrebne datoteke prebace s računala domačina na vaše, tako da možda prijenos još nije dovršen!?!

source: Return to the multiplayer game setup
Exit Game Confirmation
Save Game Error!

target: Ovo je partija bez završetka i nema pravila.

source: Endless Game (no fog)
This is an endless game without rules. Fog of war is disabled.
target: Ovo je partija bez završetka i nema pravila. Magla je onemogućena.

source: The game will end in %s.
Return to the single player menu
Do you really want to delete this replay?
Do you really want to delete this game?
target: Sigurno želite obrisati ovu spremljenu igru?

source: In this tutorial, you will get to know seafaring, which is how to handle ships and ports.
target: U ovom vodiču ćete upoznati pomorstvo i naučiti kako upravljati brodovima i lukama.

source: Show seafaring messages only
Build medium building
The tribe or team that can defeat all others wins the game!
target: Pleme ili ekipa koja može poraziti sve ostale pobjeđuje!
